snippet: If the vote is held and a new leader replaces President Hamid Karzai, it would be the first time Afghanistan has had a peaceful transfer of power.
lead_paragraph: If the vote is held and a new leader replaces President Hamid Karzai, it would be the first time Afghanistan has had a peaceful transfer of power.

headline.main: Karzai Signs Second Election Law, Clearing Way for Presidential Vote Next Year
headline.print_headline: Karzai Signs Second Election Law, Clearing Way for Presidential Vote Next Year
